_desc_idle_: The connection will be closed after the timeout(sec) for inactive clients.
_desc_disableDeflate_:
If checked,data sent by clients won't be compressed.
 (Compression usually increases load of you device)
_desc_keepBrokenTunnel_:
The tunnel wil be kept until the timeout(sec).0 means not kept.
 This function is useful for unstable connections. Data transfer will resume once reconnected.
_desc_keyLength_: (Available when encryption enabled) Set the randomkey length for encrypting data.
_desc_connectionPerRequest_:
Establish connections to the server for each request.
 It's not recommended unless special conditions,because the creating of the tunnel costs a lot.
_desc_connectionPerTCP_:
Establish connections for each tcp request.
NOT recommended
_desc_connectionPerUDP_:
Establish connections for each udp request.
This can decrease delay for udp packets.
_desc_connectionForUDP_: Let all udp requests share one connection.
_desc_encrypt_: Encrypt the stream. It's recommended when not using wss connections.
Name: Name
